about_the_game:
Fight and fly across vast alien worlds in Fight or Flight, a VR-exclusive FPS where physics-enhanced locomotion and high-powered weaponry meet. Utilize a jetpack for tactical combat or swift escape in this high-octane shooter. Every moment demands a decision - will you fight? or sacrifice vital resources to soar into the skies and escape?

Combat and Weapons:
Engage in large-scale battles with a potent and versatile arsenal. Fire a relentless onslaught of missiles from your multi-rocket launcher and remotely control missiles to adjust their trajectory. Swing and throw energy weapons that slice through foes before faithfully returning to you, boomerang-style. Unleash bullet hell with rapid-fire rifles, obliterating alien hordes. Hurl grenades and watch as aliens are blown away from their powerful explosions. Dual-wield any combination of energy weapons, rifles, rocket-launchers, or grenades for double the impact.

Environment:
Experience the awe and challenge of solar eclipses and navigate through the engulfing darkness that follows. As the world plunges into darkness and cloaks the battlefield, your strategies must adapt to pitch-black moments and lurking dangers. Be alert. Danger hides in the grass and in the shadows, ready to pounce. The environment has precious crystals essential for regenerating your energy reserves, but resources are often guarded by dangerous critters.

Locomotion:
Soar through the skies and sprint across vast, unfamiliar landscapes, utilizing a jetpack that isn’t just a tool but your lifeline, providing the freedom to engage and escape. With a physics-driven locomotion system, your movement is smooth, intuitive, and importantly, adaptable whether in escape or attack. Rain down chaos from above or engage on the ground - the choice is yours.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus RiftS, Oculus Rift CV1
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 6700k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
